text: Hi all, As previously sent here is the list of all relevant IPs, logins, etc for the various devices in the flow of these commercial playlist monitoring setups: 30 Rock Playlist Monitoring Info.xlsx Here is a workflow diagram showing the path that each playlist takes to get to displays. There are physical “editor” PCs in Dry Creek and EC that have the playlists running. We use ACI VMs to remote desktop into these PCs (there is a shortcut on each VM desktop) and then have NDI Scan Converter running on each VM to scan convert the VM output within 30 Rock ACI. Then we use the Newtek NC1 IOs to get from NDI to SDI to get into the EXE. In this case (and most likely any such similar issues in the future), the culprit was the NDI Scan Converter software had locked up on the ACI VM. By going into the taskbar and closing it and then relaunching it from the Start menu, we got back up and running right away. So that’s always the first step; the NDI Scan Converter icon looks like this: To launch it again, go to Start on the VM and type Scan and you should see it come up: Any questions, please let me know.
